resources.string: The app that makes the internet easier
Discover why we have 50,000 five-star reviews and counting.
Store logins, IDs, and payment information in your vault.
Use your favorite websites and apps without typing a username or password.
Receive real-time alerts and customized action plans to stay one step ahead.
Our patented zero-knowledge encryption means your data remains private, even from us.
Sync your 2FA tokens across the Dashlane Authenticator and Password Manager apps, so you always have access to your accounts.
